attributes.action: 'end the continuing disparity between air and rail fares. We consider that this should be addressed by substantially increasing the tax levied on short haul and domestic air travel. We believe that the revenues raised should be used to reduce the cost of longer distance rail fares. This would not only encourage more rail travel, but more importantly make a positive contribution to the Government’s environmental objectives on climate change.
